name: mall
title: Mall
challenges: Harsh lighting that does not create a welcoming environment
Lacked any kind of seating space for rest or meet-ups
Just a point of transit or a place for errands, rather than a place for spending time
The stores of Fittja Centrum did not offer anything interesting to them
Failing to provide a good working environment and lacking adequate study spaces
Staircase leading up to the library/health clinic feels unsafe
Toilets adjacent to the library had been closed due to vandalism and inappropriate use

solutions.name: cozy-movie-corner
solutions.title: Cozy Movie Corner
solutions.gist: A corner inside the shopping centre with bean bags where people can watch movies.
solutions.description: Requires a smartboard with a projector, a number of bean bags and some free snacks.
solutions.impact: Greater sense of community, opportunity for friendship and contacts.

solutions.name: aquacell-ceiling-aquarium
solutions.title: Aquacell (Ceiling Aquarium)
solutions.description: A cool aquarium in the ceiling with colourful lights.
solutions.impact: Make the space stand out and makes it more interesting, which may attract more people to visit.

solutions.name: fittja-live
solutions.title: Fittja Live
solutions.gist: A radio station that streams local storytelling live from Fittja Centrum.
solutions.description: Like Humans of New York (Fittja) in radio format. Interviews with locals and visitors. Guest DJs who play sets, and musicians from the area.
solutions.impact: Creates a sense of community and belonging. Makes Fittja more known to outsiders, changes its reputation.

solutions.name: the-co-painted-ceiling
solutions.title: The Co-Painted Ceiling
solutions.gist: The walls and ceilings of the centre can be painted by visitors on the spot.
solutions.description: ”A live exhibition”: local residents paint walls and ceilings together as an event. The ceiling tiles can be taken down to become canvases that people can paint on.
solutions.impact: Community and belonging. Makes Centrum more colourful. Ownership of the space contributes to a perception of safety.

name: station
title: Station
challenges: Best part of Fittja is that it is so well connected through buses and the underground
Feels safer as there tends to be many people passing by
Lacks activities that do not involve consumption
Damaged or broken lightning, noisy, unpleasant space to stay in

solutions.name: play-win-ticket-pwt
solutions.title: Play, Win, Ticket (PWT)
solutions.gist: Ticket-hall becomes an arcade. Winning a game gives you a free underground ticket.
solutions.description: An arcade where people can play games and winning gives one a free single ride on the underground.
solutions.impact: Makes the place more fun and creates a good atmosphere. People would be less likely to dodge fares.

solutions.name: updated-suburban-signs
solutions.title: Updated Suburban Signs
solutions.description: Street signs that represent the suburbs/suburban culture in a more comical way, making the place more personal and unique.

solutions.name: the-alternative-ticket-machine
solutions.title: The Alternative Ticket Machine
solutions.gist: Alternative ways of purchasing underground and bus tickets.
solutions.description: Underground and bus tickets are exchanged for socially beneficial tasks such as recycling, picking up cigarette butts, doing squats, doing night walks for public safety, etc.
solutions.impact: Creates activity, makes public transportation accessible, make the space safer.

solutions.name: alternative-multi-function-noise
solutions.title: Alternative, Multi-Function Noise
solutions.gist: Noise barrier that can also be used 50/50 as a vertical plant and graffiti wall.
solutions.impact: Changes the soundscape of the space, minimises noise pollution. Provides decoration and greenery.

name: back-side
title: Back side
challenges: Dark and abandoned by some, who reported it was scary at night
Whilst others considered it a more spacious, better lit, and calmer area compared to the front entrance

solutions.name: more-light
solutions.title: More Light
solutions.gist: More colourful lights underneath stairs, street lights, by entrances, for special occasions, etc.
solutions.description: Lighting up Fittja to a safer and more welcoming space for all. Lighting attracts people and colour makes you happy.
solutions.impact: A different atmosphere. A modernised space. A safer place.

solutions.name: food-truck
solutions.title: Food Truck
solutions.gist: Food truck with street food and a light show.
solutions.description: Street food from every continent. With a light show.
solutions.impact: Attracts more people, welcomes everyone, lights up dark spaces.

solutions.name: pink-street
solutions.title: Pink Street
solutions.gist: Pink Street shows you the way, but is also a destination in itself.
solutions.description: Pink Street encourages walking. Along the street are welcoming and innovative spaces for public use (e.g. arts stage, seating space, graffiti walls...).
solutions.impact: Leads people away from Centrum, creates a lively space for more people, extends public mobility patterns.

solutions.name: hub-for-reuse-and-remake
solutions.title: Hub for Reuse and Remake
solutions.gist: Turning the empty premises by the corner to a meeting and exchange space for all.
solutions.description: The hub is linked to the public library. Items and clothing can be turned in. There is also a remake-workshop and a bike rental to complement the bus and underground.
solutions.impact: Brings activity, light, and a circular economy model to unused premises. Meeting space that fosters local engagement.

name: square
title: Square
challenges: Group of guys and young men are standing right outside, some dealing drugs
Girls often choose a different entrance
Poor street lighting by the entrance

solutions.name: radio-145
solutions.title: Radio 145
solutions.description: A transparent glassbox that works as a Radiobooth.
solutions.impact: More life, movement, and sounds. Provides a space and platform for new people. Community Feeling!

solutions.name: greenspace
solutions.title: Greenspace
solutions.description: Three small greenhouses placed on the square, that work as phone charging stations powered by solar cells.
solutions.impact: Cozier, safer, environmentally friendly and sustainable.

solutions.name: quickfix-for-the-square
solutions.title: Quickfix for the Square
solutions.gist: Temporary lights and decorations on facades, rooftops, and on the ground.
solutions.description: Colourful fairy lights and hanging plants. Light installations projected onto facades and the ground.
solutions.impact: Cozier, more unique, safer, more fun, more welcoming.

solutions.name: modular-meeting-point
solutions.title: Modular Meeting Point
solutions.gist: Modular blocks that create temporary spaces for meeting points.
solutions.description: Free! Non-commercial purposes. Modular blocks or boxes that allow people to build their own spaces for homework, yoga, arts, hangouts and conversations.
solutions.impact: More movement, more meeting points allowing people to spend more time on the square.
